channel.title: Two players games with two pads on PC suggestions?
channel.description: Hey guys and gals. It's me again.. :3 Since my last thread turned into the lair of nasty off-topic and ragefest, let me introduce you to this new one. :wink: This time I basically need some suggestions for two players games utilising two pads. I have Xbox360 pad and some old Trust wireless pad (Sight Fighter Wireless). Not sure if it's even possible for them both to work simultaneously so lets throw anything you've got on your mind here. I have Xpadder if it might help. I'm out of ideas..

item.title: Two players games with two pads on PC suggestions?
item.dc:creator: Jeannotvb
item.source: Two players games with two pads on PC suggestions?
